name: Bawls
description:
a and d to control the paddle.  Press n to advance to the next level.

See the console window for your score (I havent figured out an easy way to write a score in game yet).  The console window opens at the same time as the game and thats the games information back to you.

There are 3 steps you only have to do one time to get it running on mac:   

1. right click on the folder -> services -> new terminal at folder.  

2.  type `xattr -cr lib*`.  

3. right click open, open on the game
